name: Captain Cosmo
description:
Captain Cosmo is a 1 - 4 player side-scrolling arcade game.

Captain Cosmo, hero of the universe, is out to save the world from the Munchies who escaped from the zoo. A side-scrolling game, the player can walk along the ground or fly through the air. Each level contains 5 yellow Munchies which flit rapidly about the level. If the player shoots them with their laser gun, the Munchy turns green, and can be safely picked up and carried back to the zoo. If the player returns all 5 Munchies, they complete the level, and advance to the next challenge.
